attributes.action: Challenge Nottinghamshire County Councils plan to cut £31m of Front Line Services across the county.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nottinghamshire County Council has revealed plans to cut £31m from front line services next year in order to balance their budget. These cuts will undoubtedly affect the most vulnerable people in the local community in addition to leading directly to hundreds of job losses, the plans include: 
• Selling off all the counties care homes.
• Closing the majority of the counties day centres. 
• Closing Household Waste Recycling Centres.
• Automating the counties library services.
• Closing the six County Contact centres.

The government is urged to challenge these plans that once actioned cannot be reversed and will result in the loss of support networks that promote the independence of many of Nottinghamshire’s most vulnerable people.
